item.title: Please help ffs
item.dc:creator: @I_Uk_0wn4g3_I I Uk 0wn4g3 I
item.description:
@I_Uk_0wn4g3_I wrote:

[code]if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;

} else {

talk2(“Hello, “+playerName+” ,Welcome to EliteScape,”, “Take these as a free gift.”, 2244);
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(556, 5000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(554, 1000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(995, 25000000);
} [/code]

Right im trying to make it so once a guy has chosen his looks, the text appears afterwards how would i do that exactly?

Read full topic
